arm_group.description:
Patients with squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck, targeted therapies, plasma samples:
Group 1 = patients treated with radiation therapy and cetuximab according to Bonner et al [11]
Group 2 = patients treated with cetuximab in combination with chemotherapy according to Vermorken et al. [10]
Group 3 = patients treated with a molecular targeted agent as a part of a clinical study

biospec_descr.textblock:
One EDTA tube is collected at the beginning of the study and there are only plasma samples
      at baseline, during treatment, and at progression.

brief_summary.textblock:
The investigators  will collect plasma samples at baseline, during treatment, and at
      progression.

clinical_study.brief_title: Collection of Plasma Samples for Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck Patients
clinical_study.condition: Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck

detailed_description.textblock:
In this study, the investigators will collect plasma samples at baseline, during treatment,
      and at progression. This plasma bank will be used to study the potential value of some
      biomarkers to predict treatment activity or resistance to cetuximab or other targeted agents

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  patients treated with radiation therapy and cetuximab according to Bonner et al

          -  patients treated with cetuximab in combination with chemotherapy according to
             Vermorken et al.

          -  patients treated with a molecular targeted agent as a part of a clinical study

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  patients with another type of head and neck cancer

          -  patients non treated with targeted therapies

study_pop.textblock:
PATIENTS TREATED WITH MOLECULAR TARGETED THERAPIES FOR SQUAMOUS CELL CARCINOMA OF THE HEAD
        AND NECK

intervention.description: Plasma samples at baseline (and one whole blood sample) and at every radiological evaluations

clinical_study.official_title: Prospective Collection of Plasma Samples From Patients Treated With Molecular Targeted Therapies for Squamous Cell Carcinoma of the Head and Neck

primary_outcome.description: All the analyses will be done when we have enough of collected samples
primary_outcome.measure: Prospective storage of plasma samples of patients treated with cetuximab or other targeted agents

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.source: Cliniques universitaires Saint-Luc- Université Catholique de Louvain

lead_sponsor.agency: Cliniques universitaires Saint-Luc- Université Catholique de Louvain

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
